personalInfo.splInterest: Surfing the internet, coin collecting, relaxing

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt / 75th qualifier from Qualifying Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.carHigh: 2011: Made the cut in three of seven starts during his rookie Web.com Tour season. One of the few lefthanders on the Web.com Tour...Has never played in a PGA TOUR event. Has also played on the eGolf Tour and the NGA Hooters Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: First-team all-conference selection at Old Dominion in 2007 and 2010. Earned second-team honors in 2008 and 2009. Was the runner-up at his conference tournament three of four years. Had three collegiate victories and did not miss a single event. Selected to the Colonial Athletic Association's 25th anniversary team...Attended St. Mark's High School in Wilmington, DE. Won the 2006 state championship and was a three-time all-state selection.
tourBios.personal: Says making it to the final stage of the 2010 PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament is his biggest thrill in golf. Cites becoming an uncle as his biggest thrill outside of golf...Would most like to play Augusta National and Pebble Beach...Never travels without his iPod and computer...Favorite college team is the Duke Blue Devils and the Old Dominion Big Blue. Favorite professional team is the Dallas Cowboys...Superstitions include always marking his ball with a quarter head's up...Favorite TV show is "SportsCenter."...Favorite movie is "Dumb and Dumber"...Favorite foods are Italian and Japanese...Favorite athlete to watch is Tiger Woods...Favorite vacation spot is Dewey Beach, DE...Would round out his dream foursome with his dad, Jack Nicklaus and Woods...Not many people know that he would have never played golf if it were not for a diagnosed blood disorder in 1999...Bucket list includes skydiving, scuba diving and riding in a NASCAR car...Charities include American Heart Association, Little Sisters of the Poor and the Leukemia Society...Has two older sisters, Laura and Kristen...Twitter account is @onesi3...Carries beef jerky and peanut butter and jelly sandwiches in his golf bag.

tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Medaled (won) at the Canada Qualifying Tournament shooting 69-69-67-69, earning exempt status for the entire Mackenzie Tour season.

2011: Made the cut in three of seven starts during his rookie Web.com Tour season. One of the few lefthanders on the Web.com Tour...Has never played in a PGA TOUR event. Has also played on the eGolf Tour and the NGA Hooters Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: First-team all-conference selection at Old Dominion in 2007 and 2010. Earned second-team honors in 2008 and 2009. Was the runner-up at his conference tournament three of four years. Had three collegiate victories and did not miss a single event. Selected to the Colonial Athletic Association's 25th anniversary team...Attended St. Mark's High School in Wilmington, Del. Won the 2006 state championship and was a three-time all-state selection.
tourBios.personal: Says making it to the final stage of the 2010 PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament is his biggest thrill in golf. Cites becoming an uncle as his biggest thrill outside of golf...Would most like to play Augusta National and Pebble Beach...Never travels without his iPod and computer...Favorite college team is the Duke Blue Devils and the Old Dominion Big Blue. Favorite professional teams are the Dallas Cowboys, Atlanta Braves and Philadelphia Flyers...Superstitions include always marking his ball with a quarter head's up...Favorite TV show is "SportsCenter."...Favorite movie is "Dumb and Dumber."...Favorite foods are Italian and Japanese...Favorite athlete to watch is Tiger Woods...Favorite vacation spot is Dewey Beach, Del...Would round out his dream foursome with his dad, Jack Nicklaus and Woods...Not many people know that he would have never played golf if it were not for a diagnosed blood disorder in 1999...Bucket list includes skydiving, scuba diving and riding in a NASCAR car...Charities include American Heart Association, Little Sisters of the Poor and the Leukemia Society...Has two older sisters, Laura and Kristen...Twitter account is @onesi3...Carries beef jerky and peanut butter and jelly sandwiches in his golf bag.

dyn.dynBios: He was diagnosed with a blood disorder in 1999 that made him give up contact sports and take up golf.
dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T4th in 2015 at the SIGA Dakota Dunes Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T53rd in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
